name: Phoenix AI
description: What is the project about? Phoenix AI offers a comprehensive suite of features, including an NFT marketplace, a platform for converting text into NFTs, and a captivating PvP game. Step into the realm of NFTs, transform your words into exclusive digital assets, and partake in intense player-versus-player combat. It's a premier hub for those passionate about NFTs and gaming. What makes your project unique? The unique aspect of Phoenix AI lies in its integration of multiple features into a single platform. It's not just an NFT marketplace; it also offers a novel Text-to-NFT platform, allowing users to create NFTs from text, and includes an engaging PvP (Player vs. Player) game. This combination provides a diverse experience that caters to both NFT collectors and gamers, making it a comprehensive destination within the digital asset space. History of your project. The NFT Marketplace, which began development in November 2023, is now operational. We have successfully secured 80,000 MATIC during its presale event. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Release NFT Game, Integrating NFT Marketplace with AI, Exchange Listing. What can your token be used for? PXAI token can be used to buy the Game NFTs and also encourage the users to use this token to get discounted service fee.
